name: Lil' Flute
description:
You are a flute player, who got stuck in the wrong place at the wrong time, and now has to play the flute, the drums, and the bass all at the same time, all while trying to escape king Etulf's witch. Will you be able to flute your way out of this one, or will you stay trapped in this hell forever?

Movement - [W] [A] [S] [D]
Flute - [J] [K] [L] [;]
Bass - [Q] [E]
Drums - [SPACE]

Credits:

POBIX - Programming

GoldenGold - Art

SomebodyThePro - Music

Made with Godot Engine

Patch: improved score system accuracy, fixed music synchronization
